review: I LOVED this! I previously purchased & returned Google Chromecast. The Fire stick was soooooo much easier to use & is actually faster loading Netflix than it is through our Blu Ray player hooked to another tv. I'd recommend this to anyone!

review: I sure hope Amazon reads this. I received this FireStick as a gift for Christmas. My kids and I loved playing games and using YouTube's TV Queue as a Karaoke! By February, I had to unplug the power cord often to reset the system because various apps stopped working while running or the device woukd freeze. Eventually, this unplugging of the power cord became multiple times daily. Now, Netflix and YouTube don't work at all - the main apps I use. I will go back to using my Google ChromeCast which, thus far, has had zero problems. ChromeCast doesn't have all the awesome games nor the remote like FireStick, but at least it works.
author: G. Moore
